overview:
Rick Maiero, VP Product Management at Chumby, has spent over 30 years focused on bringing high technology products and services to market. Rick has served in executive and senior management positions in a broad range of industries including high availability hosted services, embedded systems, mobile applications, analytics, semiconductors, and enterprise software systems.

Rick has spent the last ten years developing SAAS systems for security, web analytics and identity management applications. Previously Rick was Director of Development/New Initiatives for ID Analytics, CEO of Boojum Mobile, President/COO of Keylime Software and partner in a management consulting firm.
